item.description:
What the Massachusetts Life Sciences Center Can Do For Your Business
When: Tuesday, February 1, from 7:30 a.m. to 9:00 a.m.
Where: McLaneâ€™s TradeCenter
300 TradeCenter, Suite 6400
Woburn, MA
Website: http://www.mclane.com...
Dr. Susan Windham-Bannister, President & CEO of the Massachusetts Life Sciences Center, will present on the Center and its various programs at this event, hosted by McLane, Graf, Raulerson & Middleton. For more information or to RSVP please contact Heather Wolcott at heather.wolcott@mclane.com.
item.name: What the Massachusetts Life Sciences Center Can Do For Your Business
